name: Conqueror's Blade - Immortal Warlord Collector's Pack
detailed_description:
Let legends of your conquest echo throughout eternity with the Immortal Warlord Collector’s Pack! Equip the Immortal Attire Set to give your nodachi-wielding warlord the furious look of a Japanese war god. You’ll also get some mighty horse armor, a 30-day Premium subscription, and 25,000 Silver.

The Immortal Warlord Collector’s Pack contains:


  • Immortal Attire Set: Show us your war face! Comes with the Immortal Kabuto, Immortal Do-maru, Immortal Kusari Gloves, and Immortal Kusari Boots.
  • Horse Armor: Turn your mount into a mighty steed worthy of a war god.
  • 30-day Premium Account: Earn experience faster, and unlock other unique privileges!
  • 25,000 Silver: Plenty of currency to kickstart your military career!

Get the Immortal Warlord Collector’s Pack and start writing your legend in Conqueror’s Blade today!

IMPORTANT: Some items within the Collector’s Packs (such as Premium time) are account-wide and will benefit all your active characters throughout their duration. Other items (including warlord, unit, and mount skins) will be permanently bound to a single character when used. These items will be deposited in a special web inventory, from which they can be transferred to active characters. Once transferred, the item cannot be used by another character or account. If you delete a character to which you have transferred an item, that item will be lost.

To assign your new items to your characters in Conqueror’s Blade, head over to your web inventory and sign in with your Conqueror’s Blade account! You can also check out a full guide to the transfer process here.

short_description: Let legends of your conquest echo throughout eternity with the Immortal Warlord Collector’s Pack! Comes with the Immortal Attire Set, Horse Armor, a 30-day Premium account, and 25,000 Silver!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/10 - 64bit Only
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4-Core Processor +
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750 / AMD Radeon R9 270 +
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/10 - 64bit Only
  • Processor: Intel I7 4-Core Processor 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
